name: inaudibility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of not being able to be heard: The music faded into inaudibility. The occasional inaudibility of the dialogue is slightly frustrating. See
inaudible
More examplesFewer examplesMuch of the performance bordered on inaudibility.The inaudibility of the violins spoiled the performance.Audience members complained of the inaudibility of her voice.
